info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:47AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Oneida and north central Otsego Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1146 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Winfield, or 11 miles southwest of Ilion, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richfield Springs, Bridgewater, Exeter Center and Unadilla Forks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
